Header: Police Search for Hit-and-Run Driver Who Struck a Woman
Content: The police have launched a search operation to trace a Van which fled after it had over run a person near the Moratuwa- Lunawa railway station. Yesterday evening the Van over ran a pedestrian and fled. The 45 year old pedestrian who was a resident of Moratuwa â€“ Moderawatta area succumbed to injuries after being admitted to the Lunawa hospital.
